title: Lone.Wolf.and.Cub.-.Sword.of.Vengeance.1972.720p.BluRay.AVC-mfco
description:
In this first film of the Lone Wolf and Cub series, adapted from the manga by Kazuo Koike, we are told the story of the 

Lone Wolf and Cub's origin. Ogami Itto, the official Shogunate executioner, has been framed for disloyalty to the 

Shogunate by the Yagyu clan, against whom he now is waging a one-man war, along with his infant son, Daigoro.
